templateDef.name: Generic Event
templateDef.desc: Generic event to watch to send data..

templateDef.name: Azure connection string
templateDef.desc: Enter the connection string for a policy with 'send' rights.

triggers.name: {{.generic_event}} - Send to Event Hub
triggers.def:
var data = event.data.data
data.name = event.endpoint.name
data.key = event.endpoint.key

eventhub.send('azure_eventhub', data);
